Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: A great food for a good price and staff is friendly. I recommend it here.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Oh, the Poffertjes. I would have a picture of them up here had we not eaten them so fast. This is a beautiful Jordaan spot though you probably can’t go wrong with any of the restaurants in the vicinity. But we were recommended this from …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Really nice place, shame about the service from the very short haired girl with big hoops. If you want someone to move out of your way maybe ask politely instead of insinuating that I have eyes at the back of my head.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: This cafe was recommended to us by our tour guide to find good Dutch food with regular locals. It was pretty good. We ordered the bitterballen, tomato soup, and cheese fondue. Everything came out perfectly cooked. The service wasn’t super attentive, so don’t go here for that. Go here for the food.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: I have been here a few times and it’s always great to come back! A really nice, down to earth restaurant with great bitterballen and cheese plate. The staff is nice and friendly.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Classic brown cafe in the heart of the district. The mint tea was warming and fresh and the mini pancakes (Poffertjes) were fluffy and delicious. Recommend to also order the mulled wine!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Le Prins is one of my favourite little bars to visit in Amsterdam. Friendly staff in a traditional location, the food is also quite good. Relaxed with good prices.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: We did not get into De Prins because it was so busy (Thursday Oct 3, 2019 @ about 18:15).  There was a lot of happy sounds coming out from the door so we assumed that the crowd was having a great time.  We were able to see a beer delivery, …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great local atmosphere. Amsterdam meatball was very good! 1 meatball in a gravy with 3 large pieces of bread.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great brown cafe on de Prinsengracht with small menu, the real Dutch experience.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Cozy place to grab a drink and a bite to eat. Try it out when you have some time to kick back and relax. Also right by the canals with a nice view.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text:
this place was nice enough for beers and vegetarian curry

a bit small, run down and lacking in atmosphere but fine enough

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Just the sort of place we love for lunch with authentic and relaxed atmosphere. five us tried different items on the menu and we're all really pleased. topped it off with an excellent apple pie. I was shocked at how good the quality of the …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: The atmosphere is warm and welcoming. We got served great and delicious food by he very nice staff. Highly recommended!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Nice place to have a tasty beer. We chose Van Vollenhoven IPA which had very nice taste and smell. Cafe itself is atmospheric which was extra attractive for us as tourists. I recommend it for a visit.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Delicious foods & beer, good atmosphere, and friendly servers. I'll visit again when I go to Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Nice little place, no stress, no worries, no extravagant etiquettes. Just good food and drinks. Staff was lovely aswel!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Loved the food so much. Place is super cozy.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Good location, god and drink were fine, service was a bit slow

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Lovely place on the canal! Good beer and lovely view!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Found this place by accident. Absolutely loved it, I never write reviews so that’s saying something. Seat yourself, and someone comes up relatively quickly. Our food (pea soup and bitterballen) was out within 10 minutes, and drinks were out sooner. All the food was delicious and large portions too. Our favorite restaurant in Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Went there as a family to meet up with friends who also had a young child (we had 3 under 5s). Not a suitable place for families with young children. …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Warmly welcomed each time we entered. Great atmosphere! Excellent service. Food was amazing and the coffee. My daughter and I both agree that this was our favorite cafe during our 8 day stay in Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Best food with daily specials made fresh. Locals come here. That says it all

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: I went to the cafe on a Tuesday morning during February. The cafe was filled with staff and the regulars. I felt like somewhat of an inconvenience being in the cafe and had to ask for a drink, a menu, when I wanted to order food and the …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: We've had this on our list for a while! Great food and location. A perfect spot for a drink and canal watching. The service tonight was slow but they were profusely apologizing due to having several large tables inside. Would definitely return.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: I hesitate to say this is a hidden gem - not because it isn't a gem (it most definitely is) but because I don't know if I'd call this hidden. It's really close to the Anne Frank House and after our scheduled tour, we were anticipating quite …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text:
Another great example of a nice Bruin bar. Very
pleasant staff, good choice of beers and hard alcohol. Music, but not to loud, there is always a table despite the very touristic location. Have seen a couple of mice though.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: While exploring Jordaan we got hungry and looked up some place to eat nearby. It looked quite good on the photos so we went and ordered some nachos. They honestly were one of the best nachos I've ever eaten! I don't know about the other food but by the looks of it, it's all super yummy. Definetly worth checking out

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: yummy poffertjes and friendly and helpful staff

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text:
Our food tour of Amsterdam started here with Thijs and food tours of Amsterdam. What a way to start.
The poffertijes and beer were the perfect way to start the day. …

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Really nice place with good food.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Best bitter ballen in Amsterdam. Lovely people here too.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: We were there at 7 o'clock, it's too crowdy, too noisy, and if you want a cosy meal you'd better choose another place. However, the beer and the wine were good, fondue was great

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Friendly staff, really nice environment!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Stopped in for a light dinner.  My husband and I shared a Caesar salad and ravioli, both delicious.  Very nice staff and service.  Reasonable prices and good beer.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Very good food for the value! The staff was very helpful. A lot of different foods for good price! Will return in my next visit to Amsterdam!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Onion soup 3.7 / 5.  Beer 4/5.  Service 2/5 (empty tables and service does not work)

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text:
It a local Cafe place that's been there forever. Nothing has changed. It's forever the same. But that's all in the game at cafe the Prins!
The view outside is great. If you can crab a seat.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text:
Drinks prompt and speedy service.
Food excellent. Lovely atmosphere felt welcome and valued.
It's by the canal near Anne Frank huis worth a visit instead of queuing.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great atmosphere and good beer. My girlfriend forgot her purse there and they were so kind to text her that they found it, and we can come pick it up!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Stopped here on a whim. Just walking in the area. Food was very good. Service friendly even from gruff owner type person. Not so touristy even though near Anne Frank house. Eat here.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Absolutely packed when we went on Christmas day. Their take on a reuben is one of the tastiest sandwiches I've ever had, and prices were reasonable.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Nice place for a coffee break after a walk through the Jordaan

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Tasty food, good music, but the restaurant is short of place, so you better book a table

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Very cosy setting. The food was delicious. Highly recommend the poffertjes! The staff were very friendly and the music was lovely. Felt very relaxed

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Enjoyed this place. Staff very helpful. And engaged. Friendly as well. I had the Meatball Amsterdam, it was quite good.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Love this place, great staff, good food nice drinks and a pleasant atmosphere

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Try the Nachos. They probably the best I have ever had. Nice and quick staff. Quiet and chill place. Simple and beautiful vibe.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Vedett Extra Blond, great beer.  The soup, Tom Lag Kai with French bread...yum yum!!  My new favorite.  Thank you!!!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Food was absolutely delicious, the beef sandwich is chock full of steak, mushrooms and pesto just delicious, and seating all around the canal too!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: In the heart of Prinsengracht in Amsterdam, this small café has great food, and is a good value. Try the milkshakes and the house Club sandwich. Yum!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: We went around 11 when they weren’t busy and felt like an inconvenience to the waitresses.  The juice and beer were good though.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: The place was nice, service was very good, authentic dutch feel with locals. HOWEVER BE CAREFUL when ordering. veg pie not as described on English menu.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great atmosphere, burger was delicious, fondue was okay.  We should have ordered the one with blue cheese.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Loved the place, the food, the atmosphere and the price! Definitely worth spending a while in this bar letting time go by

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Delicious poffertjes and great service. The perfect spot to look over a beautiful canal with a drink and some food.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Authentic brown café, where you can hear the locals which is always a good sign. Just had a small coffee, but it was good value and the owner was very chatty and nice.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Lovely food and nice atmosphere. Small and busy but a good place.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great meat croquettes for €7. Ideally located near main sightseeing

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Fantastic place, good atmosphere, really good cheese fondue. Charming staff, a bit wimsical, but adds to the charm!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great place and had nice lunch food as well, we all left very happy

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Beautiful and authentic cafe in Jordaan - great service and delicious food. The poffertjes are absolutely to die for!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Friendly efficient staff. Fish of the day superb.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Calm, cool place. Fresh beers (Chouffe, Vedett IPA) and simple yet excellent meals.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Low-key no frills local cafe serving authentic grub.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: A cute little cafe...good place to get some espresso, wine, or a meal.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Great place! Staff very helpful and kind. Food also good and cosy atmosphere

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Lovely little bar restaurant and we worth a stop by. Nice people there!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Awesome Brown Coffe ! Everything is great but poffertjes are to die for. Ask for them

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Alice and Yellin made this our go to spot for our visit. Perfect people watching patio and the tostis are delicious!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Cool atmosphere. Simple menu. Nice stop for a quick lunch and a nice beer.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: If you like blue cheese you will love the blue cheese fondue.  The service is really nice and the price is good too.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Lovely food with a perfect blend of flavours. A good selection of beers

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Service was questionable was food was pretty good! Recommend the meatball. Don't recommend the croquettes.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Nice typical Amsterdam brown cafe. Great atmosphere. Do try the cheese fondue!

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: A must visit when you are in the Jordaan area. There is a good selection of beers at this bar.

Name: Cafe de Prins
Review Text: Beer and drinks awesome don't order from the lunch menu though.

Review Text: Cool atmosphere for drinks and snacks, awesome little bar!

Review Text: Quite ok food, my sallad was excellent,  pasta ok. Relaxed atmosphere, would benefit a bit of refurbishment.
